title: League Client Update Stuck at 99%
body: I've been having issues with my league patching so I reinstalled the client. Now I'm stuck at 99% every time my client tries to update. It'll be stuck at 99% at around 1-2MBs left and 0kbps. I tried the hextech repair tool to no avail. When I exit the league client, I get a bug splat error.

replies.body: Your network is probably having a bit of a hard time getting those patches fully downloaded for some reason. Let's first make sure everything is setup correctly with your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and firewalls, but let me know if adjusting those settings don't seem to help.
I think I've more or less tried everything on that list and nothing seems to work. I've never had this issue before, only recently started.
